title: Apple iPhone 18 Pro could bring new colours, A20 Pro chip and camera upgrades: Report
snippet: Apple’s iPhone 18 Pro range could bring new colour options, a smaller Dynamic Island, upgraded cameras, the A20 Pro 2nm chip, Apple’s C2 modem with improved 5G and satellite support, and a slightly larger battery, according to early leaks.

title: Grok drops big take ahead of India vs Pakistan T20 World Cup match: Here's what the AI predicted
snippet: Grok AI has predicted a narrow win for India ahead of the high-voltage T20 World Cup 2026 clash against Pakistan in Colombo, citing India’s strong head-to-head record and recent form, while warning that Pakistan’s pace attack could still turn the game.

snippet: The YUVAi Global Youth Challenge will spotlight 20 young AI innovators at the India AI Impact Summit 2026. With over 2,500 entries from 38 countries, the competition highlights youth-led solutions tackling health, climate, agriculture, accessibility and digital trust.

title: Apple’s 2026 roadmap may include home hub, cameras and refreshed HomePod mini

title: Blackstone leads $600 million raise in AI cloud Neysa at $1.4 billion enterprise value

title: Why new-age IPOs are seeing shrinking issue sizes, slashed valuations
